name: vatsim-traffic
description: Performs analysis of traffic on the VATSIM network for TMU purposes.

scripts.build: npm run build-navData && npm run _copyHtml && npm run webpack
scripts._OLDbuild: copyfiles -f client/index.html public && babel client -d public
scripts._copyHtml: copyfiles -f client/index.html public && copyfiles -f client/style/* public/style
scripts._navDataXmlJson: xml-js client/navData/Airports.xml --out client/navData/airports.json --compact && xml-js client/navData/Waypoints.xml --out client/navData/waypoints.json --compact
scripts._note: If webpack-dev becomes painfully slow, using `eval-source-map` will run faster, but will also show some duplicitave 'internal' source maps which may be annoying

author: Erik Quinn
